root: ^Don Quixote: How are you doing? Those electric shocks sounded painful.
^Please do not talk to other people

c-0: ^You: It was one of the worst things that have ever happened to me.
^Don Quixote: I feel for you. Those must be powerful blood magic. Now I have seen it all.
c-1: ^You: Please refrain from direct communication with others without my presence.
^Don Quixote: Of course! I would never.
g-0: ^Any idea on how to get out?

c-2: ^You: Do you have a plan on getting out?
^Don Quixote: Not in the slightest right now. The ingenious contraptions in this chamber are out of this world.
c-3: ^You: Do you know then why we are here?

c-0: ^You: Don’t let me spoil your grand adventure. See you next rotation
^Don Quixote: I am sure we are onto something great!
c-1: ^You: Until then. See you at the next round of rotation.
